name: Aminu Sulaiman
title: Medical Laboratory Tutor

education.institution: Sokoto State College of Health Sciences and Technology

bio: Aminu Sulaiman is a passionate laboratory science tutor who believes that accuracy and ethics are the backbone of every diagnostic result. He trains health students to master laboratory safety, specimen handling, and diagnostic reasoning for effective healthcare delivery.

testimonials.name: Zainab Abdullahi
testimonials.comment: Mr. Aminu explains lab procedures clearly and emphasizes hands-on practice, which boosts our confidence.

testimonials.name: Ibrahim Garba
testimonials.comment: A great mentor who ensures every student understands both the science and responsibility behind lab work.
